section.name: Unit 5. Ongoing Professional Development
section.summary:
Welcome to Unit 5: Ongoing Professional Development. In this unit, we explore the benefits of ongoing professional development. You will have a chance to set personal professional goals, learn about the Literacy Information and Communication System (LINCS) resources, and explore these resources to locate information that can help you meet your professional needs and better serve adult ELs in your classes.​

To get started, download these documents for use in Unit 5:

  • Pause and Think Handout
  • Scavenger Hunt Worksheet

To complete this unit, view the video for Unit 5.

Then, complete the Knowledge Check Scavenger Hunt. Follow the directions on the worksheet to complete a search at LINCS.ed.gov for the best special topics discussion groups, resources, and courses for your own burning questions.
